org.encog.persist
Interface Persistor

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicLayerPersistor, BasicNetworkPersistor, BasicNeuralDataSetPersistor, BufferedNeuralDataSetPersistor, ContextLayerPersistor, DirectSynapsePersistor, EncogScriptPersistor, GenericPersistor, OneToOneSynapsePersistor, PropertyDataPersistor, RadialBasisFunctionLayerPersistor, SVMNetworkPersistor, TextDataPersistor, TrainingContinuationPersistor, WeightedSynapsePersistor, WeightlessSynapsePersistor
public interface Persistor

This interface defines a class that can load and save an EncogPersistedObject.

Author:
jheaton

Method Summary

          Load from the specified node.
 void save(EncogPersistedObject object, WriteXML out)
          Save the specified object.
 

Method Detail

load

Load from the specified node.

Parameters:
in - The node to load from.
Returns:
The EncogPersistedObject that was loaded.

save

          WriteXML out)
Save the specified object.

Parameters:
object - The object to save.
out - The XML object.
